alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Houston; Johnson; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:59AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southern Wilkinson, northwestern Dodge, northwestern Pulaski, Twiggs, Bleckley, south central Washington, eastern Houston and northwestern Johnson Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 459 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Jeffersonville to near Cary to Klondike, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Perry, Cochran, Hawkinsville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Warner Robins, Chester, Dexter, Dudley, Toomsboro, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Robins AFB, Marion, Hayneville, Robins Air Force Base, Mobley Crossing and District Path. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Dodge; Houston; Johnson; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
